activities:
BetterCloud collects information from administrative users that install FlashPanel from the Google Apps Marketplace or access FlashPanel for the first time.  Companies in the EU and/or Switzerland are able to install the FlashPanel product.  The information collected includes name, email, phone, address, and industry.  This information is used to contact the users to encourage them to purchase FlashPanel and to categorize which countries and industries that FlashPanel is utilized.

Additionally, the BetterCloud.com and FlashPanel.com websites as well as the BetterCloud blog collect contact information (name, email) from users that wish to be notified of updates or request additional information about BetterCloud or its products.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
